gr.interamerican.bo2.utils
Class AdapterUtils

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.AdapterUtils

public class AdapterUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class taking advantage of AnyOperations.

Method Detail

apply

public static <A,R> java.util.List<R> apply(java.util.List<A> list,
                                            AnyOperation<A,R> adapter)
Creates a list that contains the results of the specified adapter operation. If the result of the specified adapter operation on an element is null, then this result will be included in the result list.

Type Parameters:
A - Type of operation argument.
R - Type of operation result.
Parameters:
list - List containing the elements on which the operation will be performed.
adapter - Adapter operation.
Returns:
Returns a list that contains the results of the adapter operation to the elements of the set.

Type Parameters:

Parameters:
map - Map containing the elements.
adapter - Adapter operation.
Returns:

apply

public static <K,V,L,W> java.util.Map<L,W> apply(java.util.Map<K,V> map,
                                                 AnyOperation<K,L> keyTrans,
                                                 AnyOperation<V,W> valTrans)
Transforms a map by applying a transformation to its keys and another transformation to its values.

Type Parameters:
K - Type of key in the input map.
V - Type of value in the input map.
L - Type of key in the output map.
W - Type of value in the output map.
Parameters:
map - Map to transform.
keyTrans - Transformation to apply to the keys. If keyTrans is null, then the keys of the output map will be the same as the keys of the input map.
valTrans - Transformation to apply to the values. If keyTrans is null, then the values of the output map will be the same as the values of the input map.
Returns:
Returns a map who's entries resulted from applying the specified transformations on each pair of key and value of the entries of the specified map.

apply

public static <A,R> R[] apply(A[] arguments,
                              R[] sample,
                              AnyOperation<A,R> adapter)
Creates an array that contains the results of the specified adapter operation. If the result of the specified adapter operation on an element is null, then this result will be included in the result array.

Type Parameters:
A - Type of operation argument.
R - Type of operation result.
Parameters:
arguments - Array containing the elements on which the operation will be performed.
sample - Array necessary in order to create the results array. It can be an empty array.
adapter - Adapter operation.
Returns:
Returns an array that contains the results of the adapter operation to the elements of the set.

apply

public static <A,R> Tree<R> apply(Tree<A> tree,
                                  AnyOperation<A,R> adapter)
Creates a tree that contains the results of the specified adapter operation.

Type Parameters:
A - Type of operation argument.
R - Type of operation result.
Parameters:
tree - Tree containing the elements.
adapter - Adapter operation.
Returns:
Returns a tree that contains the results.

concat

public static <T> java.lang.String concat(java.util.Collection<T> collection,
                                          java.lang.String propertyName,
                                          java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                          java.lang.String separator)
Concatenates the values of a specified property of all elements in a collection.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of elements in the collection
Parameters:
collection - Collection.
propertyName - Name of the property.
clazz - Class of objects in the collection.
separator - Separator that separates the tokens that are extracted from the values of the specified property in the collection elements.
Returns:
Returns a string.

getProperty

public static <T,P> java.util.List<P> getProperty(java.util.Collection<T> collection,
                                                  java.lang.String propertyName,
                                                  java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
Applies a GetProperty transformation on the specified collection.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of elements in the collection
P - Type of property.
Parameters:
collection - Collection.
propertyName - Name of the property.
clazz - Class of objects in the collection.
Returns:
Returns a list with the values of the specified property in the elements of the specified collection.

getName

public static <T> java.util.List<java.lang.String> getName(java.util.Collection<T> collection,
                                                           java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
Applies a GetProperty transformation on the specified collection for the name property.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of elements in the collection
Parameters:
collection - Collection.
clazz - Class of objects in the collection.
Returns:
Returns a list with the names of the specified property in the elements of the specified collection.

concatNames

public static <T> java.lang.String concatNames(java.util.Collection<T> collection,
                                               java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                               java.lang.String separator)
Concatenates the names of the elements in the specified collection. This method assumes, that the elements in the collection have a name property.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of elements in the collection
Parameters:
collection - Collection.
clazz - Class of objects in the collection.
separator - Separator that separates the tokens that are extracted from the values of the specified property in the collection elements.
Returns:
Returns a string.
